short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Inline annotation for the web. Simply select the text you agree or disagree, vote on it.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a handy extension to let you select and mark text on websites you are visiting.  
For those of you who are interested in sharing opinion to the web contents, this is a prefect tool for you. Ever feel irritating when a false post jump into your browser? You can stop it.

This is a testing version that works for contents on Twitter, Disqus, CNN, FoxNews, Huffington Post, Yahoo News!
